projects.descriptions: This project was the introduction to the tech degree and covered alot of the fundamentals of Javascript such as using loops, arrays and functions. This project helped me to solidify my knowledge of the basic elements of Javascript

This project allowed me to work with functions which created pages of users. The number of users could be updated dynamically by using a function to create the correct number of pages. The search function uses Javascript and the DOM to hide users who dont match the search letter

This project used html, css and Javascript  in the form. Elements on the form disappear and warning signs are displayed if certain options are selected. On submission the form is passed through a function which checks all the user inputs against regular expressions before submitting to a server. Any errors are highlighted to the user and form not submitted if there are errors. The project really help me to understand regular expressions
This project used objects and classes to create a guessing game show. This was challenging and a great introduction to the world of Object oriented programming

In this project I learned to make a request to a server for user API information. I used fetch, async/await, JSON and error handling to achieve this and created a modal window which allowed you to get additonal information and provide additional features.
